reviewText: I don't know if this is in a European format or what but it can not be played in my DVD player because of the format it's in or any of my friends that I have tried.
christmas present that brought back fond memories !!!

Kids' movie from the 80s, which quite obviously had a major impact on the imagery in Harry Potter.
Very cheesy and embarrassing in parts - I'm sure Tim Curry and Diana Rigg would rather forget this episode of their careers - but ok for children.
I cannot enjoy this movie because they sold us the Region 2 disc. Not for North America. I feel this is a scam and a lie. Disappointed.
The movie came in and will not play on any TV. It is giving an error that the format of the disk doesn't meet required video output format.
dvd format did not play in either dvd player or Playstation
Will not play in any of my DVD players.
